welcome.title: Welcome, Explorer
welcome.subtitle: Your Journey Through Time Begins
welcome.description: Embark on an extraordinary voyage through the annals of human civilization. From ancient empires to modern nations, discover the stories that shaped our world.

globe.title: The Interactive Globe
globe.subtitle: Your Gateway to Discovery
globe.description: Click on any country to unveil its rich historical tapestry. Watch as the globe responds to your curiosity, zooming into civilizations that once flourished across continents.

timeline.title: Journey Through Eras
timeline.subtitle: Navigate the River of Time
timeline.description: Explore curated timelines spanning millennia. From the Bronze Age to the Digital Era, witness how events connected across centuries to shape the world you know today.

contributions.title: Join the Chronicle
contributions.subtitle: Add Your Voice to History
contributions.description: History is written by those who share it. Contribute your knowledge, add essays, and help build the most comprehensive historical archive on the web.

getStarted.title: Begin Your Expedition
getStarted.subtitle: The Past Awaits
getStarted.description: You're ready to explore. Click on the globe, dive into timelines, and uncover the fascinating stories of human civilization. Your journey through history starts now.
